pageContext.claim: “I wish President Obama didn't get out the way he got out. Because that left a vacuum and ISIS was formed.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a flip-flop. Trump criticizes the 2011 withdrawal of combat troops from Iraq, blaming the previous administration for hastily withdrawing. But Trump supported rapid withdrawal as early as March 2007, saying the United States should “declare victory and leave.” So Trump criticizes Obama for taking action he advocated. There are also many reasons for the rise of ISIS, including the invasion of Iraq in 2003 that Trump supported.
